name: ClassicalRadio-BeautifulRelaxingSounds
0:
”Alexa open classical radio”
”Alexa tell classical radio play Classical Relaxation”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: classical radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ClassicalRadio.com offers over 50 channels of beautifully curated classical music ranging from the Medieval Period to contemporary performances by today's brightest artists and composers. Our channel selection includes curated selections from the world's most renowned composers, a variety of classical periods, favorite instrumentals, theatrical performances, and orchestral works.

Unlike other internet radio companies, we actually have Channel Curators – real people who know good music - for each of our stations. They find the best music in each style and create channels that bring listeners the music they want to hear. ClassicalRadio.com also specializes in curating channels for niche classical segments that are hard to find anywhere else.

Visit us online at www.ClassicalRadio.com to learn more.

FEATURES:
- Listen to 50+ hand-curated classical music channels 
- Not sure which channel to pick? Explore the easy-to-use styles list 
- Stream music in the foreground or in the background
- Like or dislike tracks as you listen (coming soon)
- Control audio and view track titles on display devices like Echo Show
- Save your favorite channels for quick and easy access later on our Website
- Sleep Timer feature allows you to fall asleep to music, simply say "Alexa, set sleep-timer to x minutes"
- Set data streaming preferences on our website
- Share your favorite tracks and channels on Facebook, Twitter, or by email on our website

ClassicalRadio Premium: 
 
- Enjoy your favorite beats 100% ad-free.
- Better sound quality: Choose between 320k MP3 and 128k AAC options.
- Stream Classical Radio on non Alexa devices like Roku, Squeezebox or any acoustic devices with network streaming.
- Premium access to all our other music platforms: JAZZRADIO.com, DI.FM, RadioTunes, Zen Radio, and ROCKRADIO.com. Enjoy access to 200+ other human-curated channels of high-quality music! 

HOW IT WORKS
Streaming via Amazon Alexa is available to *ClassicalRadio Premium* members only. Make sure you're logged in to your ClassicalRadio Premium account, activate the skill, lay back and enjoy the music!
